regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('https://www.eporner.com/category/4k-porn/') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = 'mvhdico"><span>(.+?)<\/span>.+?<a\shref="(.+?)"\stitle="(.+?)".+?src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://www.yuvutu.com/index.php?name=Video&op=videos&list=most_recent') html += client.request('http://www.yuvutu.com/modules.php?name=Video&op=videos&list=most_recent&period=last_week&filter=0&channel=1&style=1&page=2&category=0&country_code=&min_length=0') html += client.request('http://www.yuvutu.com/modules.php?name=Video&op=videos&list=most_recent&period=last_week&filter=0&channel=1&style=1&page=3&category=0&country_code=&min_length=0') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = '<a\shref="\/(video.+?)".+?src="(.+?)".+?title="(.+?)"\s\/><\/a>' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import cache,client,workers import re,urllib,xbmc,xbmcgui class page: def run(self, r): threads = [] ; self.r = [] ; r = [(r.index(i)+1, i) for i in r] for i in r: threads.append(workers.Thread(self.request, i)) [i.start() for i in threads] ; [i.join() for i in threads] return ''.join([str(i[1]) for i in sorted(self.r, key=lambda x: x[0])]) def request(self, i): self.r += [(i[0], client.request(i[1]))] url = 'https://www.thumbzilla.com/newest?page=' u = [] for i in range(1, 5): u += [url + str(i)] u = cache.get(page().run, 24, u) u1 = ' .+?src="(.+?)".+?title">(.+?).+? (.+?)' u = re.compile(u1, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(u) return u

main = 'https://www.nuvid.com' + '[makelist.param1]' from resources.lib.modules import control adultresolver = control.cdnImport('http://localhost/xmls/3.xml', 'adultresolver') adultresolver = adultresolver.streamer() url = adultresolver.resolve(main) return url

#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re url = '[makelist.param1]' from resources.lib.modules import control adultresolver = control.cdnImport('http://localhost/xmls/3.xml', 'adultresolver') adultresolver = adultresolver.streamer() url = adultresolver.resolve(url) r = url r0 = [i[1] for i in r] ; r1 = [i[0].upper() for i in r]
if len(r1) > 1: label = control.infoLabel('listitem.label') select = control.dialog.select(label.upper(), r1) if select == -1: return link = r0[select] else: link = r0[0] return link

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re
html = '' html += client.request('https://faapy.com/most-popular/') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', ' ', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') express = ' <a itemprop="url".+?title="(.+?)".+?\n.+?\n.+?poster="(.+?)".+?src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://www.pornhub.com/video?o=ht') html += client.request('http://www.pornhub.com/video?o=ht&page=2') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', ''', html) html = html.replace('"'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace(''', '&') express = 'data-mediumthumb="(.+?)" .+? .+? .+? .+? .+? .+? .+? .+? .+? .+? .+?href="(.+?)"\stitle="(.+?)">.+? ' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re
html = '' html += client.request('http://motherless.com/videos/recent') html += client.request('http://motherless.com/videos/recent?page=2') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', ''', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') html = html.replace('&#039;', '&') html = html.split(' <h1>
.+?Most\sRecent\sVideos', 1)[-1] html = html.split(' <div class='pagination_link'>', 1)[0] express = ' <div class="thumb-container.+?
.+?<a\shref="(.+?)".+?
.+?src="(.+?)".+?alt="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links

regex.name: playurl
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re main = '[makelist.param1]' html = client.request(main) express = 'fileurl = \'(.+?)\''
links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html)[0]
return links

regex.expres: #$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client import re html = '' html += client.request('http://momxxx.org/') html += client.request('http://momxxx.org/page/2/') html += client.request('http://momxxx.org/page/3/') html = re.sub('&#[0-9]+;', '\'', html) html = html.replace('&quot'+';', '"') html = html.replace('&', '&') express = 'href="(.+?)".+?title="(.+?)">.+?data-src="(.+?)"' links = re.compile(express, re.MULTILINE|re.DOTALL).findall(html) return links
